block.name: invoke_custom_py_code
block.description: Execute Python code: Extract Recipe Name

input.code:
import re

def main(input):
    code = input["code"]
    name_pattern = r'"name":\s+"([^"]+)"'
    minus_version_pattern = r'-\s+"version":\s+(\d+)'
    plus_version_pattern = r'\+\s+"version":\s+(\d+)'

    name_match = re.search(name_pattern, code)
    minus_version_match = re.search(minus_version_pattern, code)
    plus_version_match = re.search(plus_version_pattern, code)

    name = name_match.group(1) if name_match else None
    minus_version = minus_version_match.group(1) if minus_version_match else None
    plus_version = plus_version_match.group(1) if plus_version_match else None

    return { 'recipe_name': name, 'minus_version': minus_version, 'plus_version': plus_version }
input.name: Extract Recipe Name

block.name: invoke_custom_ruby_code
block.description: Execute ruby code: Get Message Body

input.code:
items = input['items']

formatted_items = ""

items.each do |item|
  formatted_name = item[:name].gsub('|', '/')
  formatted_items = formatted_items + "|#{formatted_name}|#{item[:compare_link]}|\n"
end

formatted_items
input.name: Get Message Body

block.name: invoke_custom_ruby_code
block.description: Execute ruby code: Get TestCase Body

input.code:
data = input["items"].gsub('=>', ':')  
workato_url = input["workato_url"]
parsed_data = parse_json(data)
formatted_data = ""

parsed_data.each_with_index do |item, index|
  status = item["status"]
  recipe_id = item["recipe"]["id"]
  job_url = "[" + item["job"]["id"] + "](" + workato_url + "recipes/" + recipe_id + "/job/"+ item["job"]["id"] + ")"
  recipe_name = item["recipe"]["name"]
  testcase_id = item["test_case"]["id"]
  testcase_name = item["test_case"]["name"]

  formatted_data = formatted_data + "|#{job_url}|#{recipe_name}|#{recipe_id}|#{testcase_name}|#{testcase_id}|#{status}|\n"
end

formatted_data
input.name: Get TestCase Body
